Name: Ginger No-jito (Temperance Ginger Mojito)
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: POUR first 2 ingredients into glass and half fill with crushed ice. ADD mint leaves and CHURN (stir). Fill glass with more crushed ice and TOP with ginger beer. Briefly churn to combine.
Review: This Mojito may lack alcohol, indeed it's alcohol-free, but it's refreshing, balanced and tasty nonetheless.
History: Adapted from a popular drink on the menu of Jamie's Italian restaurant and bar chain circa 2014. I discovered and borrowed the No-jito name from Wagamama restaurants in January 2023. Mojito Cocktail history .
